short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A solution to prevent devices from locking the screen and to maintain the screen always available

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I Am Not Away - Keep Your Focus and Availability High

The I Am Not Away solution provides an effective way to prevent your devices from dimming or locking the screen when you require uninterrupted operation of your applications. 

Furthermore, it ensures that your computer's status remains consistently marked as 'Not Away,' eliminating the need for makeshift and potentially resource-intensive workarounds. This is particularly valuable for presentations and when using your device as a screen to project websites without interruptions.

Key Features:
• Prevents your device's screen from turning off or locking during active use.
• Maintains your computer's status as 'Not Away' at all times.
• Ideal for uninterrupted presentations and projections.
• Keep control of your device and availability with I Am Not Away. 

Try it now and never lose focus when you need it most.

How to use:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WhNfvLJnnhQ

1) Click on the Chrome extension icon, 
search for 'I am not Away,' and then click on the Pin icon to keep it fixed in the toolbar. 

Once it's active on the toolbar, a single mouse click will enable or disable it. 

2) By right-clicking on the 'I am not Away' icon, you can access more options for this extension. I hope you like it

This description highlights the key features and benefits of the I Am Not Away extension, emphasizing its usefulness in specific situations like presentations and projections.
